00004 //Add an edge to the edge list of the node
00005 void Node::addEdge(EdgeEntry* edge) 
00006 {
00007         assert(lastEdge); //lastEdge is never null (initialized with dummy)
00008         lastEdge->nextEdge = edge;
00009         edge->prevEdge = lastEdge;
00010         lastEdge = edge;
00011         numEdges++;
00012 }
00013 
00014 //Node constructor
00015 Node::Node()
00016 {
00017         degree = 0;
00018     label = 0;
00019         id = 0;
00020         excess = 0;
00021         adjList = new EdgeEntry(0, 0, 0, NULL);
00022         lastEdge = adjList;
00023         numEdges = 0;
00024 }

00026 //Decrement the excess of the node
00027 void Node::decExcess(int value)
00028 {
00029         if (excess < value)
00030                 cout << "BUG";
00031         else
00032                 excess -= value; 
00033 }
00034 
00035 //Print a node
00036 void Node::printNode()
00037 {
00038         EdgeEntry* listPtr = adjList->getNext();
00039         while (listPtr != NULL)
00040         {
00041                 cout << listPtr->getEndPoint() << " (" << listPtr->getCapacity() << ")" << ", ";
00042                 listPtr = listPtr->getNext();
00043         }
00044         cout << endl;
00045 }

00047 //Print the node debug dump info
00048 void Node::debugNodeDump()
00049 {
00050         cout << getID() << ": ";
00051         cout << getDegree() << ", \t";
00052         cout << Utils::printValue(getLabel()) << ", \t";
00053         cout << getExcess();
00054         cout << endl;
00055 }

00057 //Overwrite the node "greater then" and "less then" operators
00058 bool Node::operator>(const Node* node) const
00059 {
00060         return label > node->label;   
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool Node::operator<(const Node* node) const
00064 {
00065         return label < node->label;   
00066 }
